name: Harvey Randall

quotes.quote: A man's reach should exceed his grasp, Or what's a heaven for?

profile: I am a final year Computer Science undergraduate. I am looking to gain professional experience as a software engineer and am seeking a position as a graduate to develop expertise and positively contribute towards a companyâ€™s success.

projects.name: Auction Website
projects.description: A coursework project created for a Web Programming module. As part of a group we developed an auction website, similar to eBay, with similar functionality. The website was implemented using Django, the framework taught as part of the module, and using Bootstrap and jQuery on the frontend to add extra functionality and make the website look more professional.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A coursework project created for a Graphical User Interfaces module. As part of a group I used socio-technical models and data gathering techniques to implement a Weather app for golfers. The solution was implemented using preact, a lightweight version of React.

projects.name: Registry website
projects.description: A coursework project created for a Software Engineering module. As part of a group we carried out domain analysis, requirements analysis, design and prototype implementation of this project. The project was created using PHP's Laravel framework.
